snippet: Orlando beat winless Washington, 103-85, as Dwight Howard scored 28 points and pulled down 20 rebounds.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Orlando Magic defeat Washington Wizards, 103-85; other results in the NBA noted.
lead_paragraph: Orlando beat winless Washington, 103-85, as Dwight Howard scored 28 points and pulled down 20 rebounds.

headline.seo: Magic Beat Wizards Behind Dwight Howard Double-Double
headline.main: Magic Top Wizards as Howard Posts 20-20
headline.print_headline: Magic Top Wizards As Howard Posts 20-20
